And it is not just politicians who are doing this to each other, and, frankly, politics has always been a contact sport in this country. but with all of the cable channels and talk radio and blogs, especially blogs, where people can be anonymous with their nastiness, I think has caused a level of coarseness in our society that we've all got to think about.
